subtasks.details: Created comprehensive site-optimization-guide.md covering image optimization strategies (WebP, lazy loading), CSS optimization (purging, minification), JavaScript optimization (defer, async), caching headers (.htaccess and Netlify _headers), performance metrics targets (FCP, LCP, TTI, CLS, FID), accessibility checklist (WCAG 2.1 AA compliance), cross-browser testing recommendations, responsive design testing breakpoints, SEO best practices, monitoring and maintenance procedures, and quick reference commands for testing.
subtasks.testStrategy: Review documentation completeness, verify all optimization strategies are actionable, confirm testing procedures are comprehensive, validate performance targets are realistic

subtasks.title: Configure Formspree account and test contact form
subtasks.description: Set up Formspree account and configure form endpoint for contact form functionality
subtasks.details: Configure Formspree account, obtain form endpoint URL, update contact.md form action attribute, test form submissions, configure spam protection settings, set up email notifications, and verify success/error message handling.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test form submission with valid data, verify email delivery, confirm spam protection works, validate success message display, test error handling for invalid submissions

subtasks.title: Conduct final performance and accessibility testing
subtasks.description: Run comprehensive tests using Lighthouse, WAVE, and cross-browser validation
subtasks.details: Execute final testing suite including Lighthouse audit (targeting 90+ scores), WAVE accessibility tool validation, keyboard-only navigation testing, screen reader testing (NVDA/JAWS/VoiceOver), mobile responsive testing (320px-1920px), cross-browser testing (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge), form submission testing, print preview validation, SEO validation with Google Search Console, and Core Web Vitals monitoring setup.
subtasks.testStrategy: Achieve Lighthouse scores of 90+ in all categories, pass WAVE accessibility scan with no errors, confirm keyboard navigation works throughout site, validate screen reader compatibility, test on minimum 5 different devices/screen sizes
